title: Tour of Tuscany Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, August 13, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a guided tasting through the heart of Italy’s most celebrated wine region. This event highlights some of Tuscany’s most iconic expressions, from bold Brunello to elegant Chianti Classico.

Tasting Fee: $35 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• Banfi Brunello di Montalcino 2019 – 95 pts James Suckling, 94 pts Wine Spectator, 94 pts Wine Enthusiast, 93 pts Jeb Dunnuck – A layered, polished Brunello with cherry, mushroom, spice, and refined tannins.

• Tenuta di Arceno Chianti Classico 2022 – 93 pts Wine Spectator, 91 pts James Suckling – Sleek and balanced with cherry, raspberry, and vibrant acidity.

• Frescobaldi Tenuta Perano Chianti Classico 2021 – 93 pts Wine Spectator – Violet, wild rose, and spice aromas lead into a fresh, mineral-driven finish.

• Tolaini Al Passo Toscana 2020 – 92 pts James Suckling, 91 pts Wine Spectator – A rich, savory Super Tuscan with blackberry, spice, and a long, firm finish.

Celebrate the elegance and tradition of Tuscan winemaking—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
